name: Commanding Change
description:
January 2018

A 2D Puzzle-Platformer where you master extreme weather as W.E.R. a robot created to secure the future of humanity. Prove W.E.R. is up to the challenge as it overcomes obstacles with the weather at its command!

Features

  • Traverse levels and solve puzzles
  • Command the weather at the touch of a button
  • Test your self in time trials

View our website
